thread.section_title: Paradise Awards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paradise Awards | paradiseawards.com
thread.title: Deana

author: Deana
title: Deana
text: I had a great experience working with Paradise Awards. Extremely quick in responding to emails. Answered all my questions, awards were received before the date needed, staff was super helpful. They were also able to order an award I found on another site but not on theirs, so that I could order all my awards from one company. The awards were AMAZING and of great quality. Will definitely use them again next year.
